typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> preDimBusinessAreaInput
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==106 && TARGET_CODE!='PI') ~> FilterBuinessAreaAndNoPICode
SelectOnlyTargetColumns aggregate(groupBy(target_code,
		target_description),
	each(match(!in(['target_code','target_description'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicator
Deduplicator derive(grp_key = case(in(['EN','BU'],target_code), 'EG', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], target_code), 'PI', target_code)),
		grp_description = case(in(['EN','BU'],target_code), 'Energy+', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], target_code), 'P&I', target_description)),
		bua_key = case(in(['PM','PF'],target_code), 'PI', target_code),
		bus_bua_key = case(in(['PM','PF'],target_code), 'PI', target_code),
		bua_description = case(in(['PM','PF'],target_code), 'P&I', target_description),
		last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_business_area') ~> ExpressionMedLastUpdatedBy
FilterBuinessAreaAndNoPICode select(mapColumn(
		target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyTargetColumns
ExpressionMedLastUpdatedBy sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_business_area.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimBusinessAreaUpdate
